channel.title: Mystery Demo Disc
channel.description:
I have this vague memory of being a child and playing this demo disc on the computer. I don't have much to go off of, but something might ring a bell to one of you.
In the menu to pick your desired demo or game or whatnot, there was a Vitruvian Man in the middle, and the games encircled him. A bolt of lightning would strike out from him to highlight whatever game you hovered your mouse over. That's all I remember. This is probably from the late 90s. My best guess.
PS: Since my memory is so fuzzy about this, it makes me wonder if it wasn't some weird dream I may have had. Who knows if it was real, but it's been on my mind lately.

item.title: Mystery Demo Disc
item.dc:creator: LordSkunk_707
item.description:
Now THAT seems fishy. But I don’t know, it’s practically nostalgic. Wish I knew what it was. Some sort of game collection. Maybe it wasn’t demos.

Read full topic

item.title: Mystery Demo Disc
item.dc:creator: Pyroclase
item.description:
Lord 707:

PS: Since my memory is so fuzzy about this, it makes me wonder if it wasn’t some weird dream I may have had. Who knows if it was real, but it’s been on my mind lately.

That might very well be it; I personally don’t trust my oldest memories. Case in point, I have this very distinct memory of visiting a seaside resort in Florida that was in the middle of a wheat field.

Read full topic

item.title: Mystery Demo Disc
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
I remember from back in the day that the pirated game collection CD’s from russia always had cool animated launchers, other than that, good luck in your search.

Read full topic
